arts.ttl: Report: Stockport County 0 Wigan Athletic 0 - Goalless draw as Latics extend unbeaten run
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic extended their unbeaten run to six after a goalless draw with Stockport County in League One.

arts.ttl: Stockport held at home by Wigan
Wigan Athletic star currently taking time out to sort 'personal issues'
arts.sum: Chris Sze is taking time out to sort out some 'personal issues' - but his future definitely remains with Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Former Wigan Athletic man joins League Two outfit Fleetwood Town
arts.sum: Former Wigan Athletic midfielder Liam Shaw has joined League Two outfit Fleetwood Town for the rest of the season.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Three changes in our expected team v Stockport
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Stockport County

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic star desperate to make up for lost time - watch out Stockport County!
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic star Jonny Smith has signalled his intention to take out two months of frustration on League One defences - with his sights firmly set on Stockport County this weekend.

arts.ttl: ‘Will just edge it’ – Stockport County vs Wigan Athletic prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Stockport County vs Wigan Athletic prediction ahead of their League One clash on Saturday afternoon. The post ‘Will just edge it’ – Stockport County vs Wigan Athletic prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stockport County vs. Wigan Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Stockport County and Wigan Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss expects Stockport County onslaught - 'It will be an open game - let's see what we have'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney says Wigan Athletic set a 'benchmark' against Peterborough United in midweek - and challenged his players to maintain that level against Stockport County this weekend.
